channel.title: daily log on Ritesh thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in daily log on Ritesh thoughts

item.title: #12 Task Tracking Setup - Tuesday, 11th January 2022
item.description: A couple of months ago, my system to track tasks broke down. The system was my own brain and depended on its ability to remember things. But it had this bug where it can only remember so many things before an incoming information pushes out “address the comments on the performance testing design spec”. I had a physical book and Evernote to complement my ability to remember things but these didn’t make me more productive or make my life any easier.

item.title: #7 Why I Run in the Morning - Thursday, 6th January 2022
item.description: Doing hard things is hard. But you have to do it to be the best version of yourself. Everyday is a struggle but at the end of the day I’m happy I chose to do the hard things.

item.title: #6 Right Arm Over the Wicket or Why I use my Own Platform to Write - Wednesday, 5th January 2022
item.description: I used to write on blogging platforms like Medium and DEV.to. I stopped using them and started writing on my own blog recently. Here, I explore why I chose to do that and make bold predictions on the outcome of a cricket match.

item.title: #5 Word Embeddings and Swiss Army Knives - Tuesday, 4th January 2022
item.description: What’s cooler than representing words as real-valued vectors to capture its semantic meaning?

item.title: #4 My Blog Setup and Writing Process - Monday, 3rd January 2022
item.description: I recently started writing on my own website. Here’s a look into my setup and the process I follow to write posts.

item.title: #3 Blocked by Blockchains - Sunday, 2nd January 2022
item.description: Learning about Blockchain, Crypto and Web3.

item.title: #2 Goals for 2022 - Saturday, 1st January 2022
item.description: My goals for 2022, publicly posted for accountability.

item.title: #1 New Year, New Me - Friday, 31st December 2021
item.description: I will blog daily. Or at least I hope to.
